comments: Took for Intro Pharm GREAT CLASS - YOU WORK FOR IT. Lots of students dropped but Dr. G is great. Tough, expects you to study and do the assignments but she\'s really smart. Worked for my A Weekly tests and weekly hw assignment. 2 midterms and a final. Has a TON of study resources- ppts done in class, quizlets, study qs, etc Had a great experience!

comments: Her class is very fast-paced and you\'ll need to print out a lot of material. But when I say she encourages you to do what you need to help you in this class, I mean it. I wasn\'t prepared for this class, but I love how passionate she is about what she teaches. Definitely a class you seriously need to prepare for.

comments: Amy is so helpful in lecture and lab! Anatomy is not an easy subject but she does everything she can to help everyone succeed! Amy is a great person and I would recommend getting to know her during her office hours. She is the only professor I have ever had who had an answer to every question anyone asked.

comments: Wow. I really loved taking her class! it was really hard but she was the first science teacher I\'ve ever had who has had an answer to EVERY SINGLE question. If you have never taken a super hard AP science (ie C. AP mechanics, and electromagnetism) you are not ready for this lady. but if you pass her class, you can probably do anything in life.

comments: She is known by advisors and students as the hardest science teacher there is, and I wish I would have known this since it was my first semester of college. She is a super sweet and nice lady, and very helpful! But omg she gives out soo much hmwk and her tests are super hard. Very little extra credit. Would not recommend unless you are a brainiac.

She means well, but before she lectures she expects you to read, understand, take the quiz and THEN she attempts She gives out two quizzes a week and expects way too much out of you!! Also, she gets behind and its up to you to learn the material on your own to catch up.

comments: I took her for AP 1 and absolutely enjoyed the class. Very clear on what she expects, has 3 optional study tables a week, responds to emails in like 10 minutes, and will drop what ever she is doing to help you. It\'s not easy but that that\'s A&P for you. Homework and Vic quiz are only 5 points so don\'t fear those, just beware the bear in the corner!

comments: Amy has been the most helpful professor in my college career. She wants you to learn the material and do well in the class. She offers review sessions multiple times a week to help prepare. You will have at least one exam a week, but it works well with her teaching style. The class was tough but very rewarding with Amy as the Professor!

The problem is the teaching style being used is a new one for her, there are tests every week and vocab quizzes every Monday. Before she lectures she expects you to read, understand, take the quiz and THEN she attempts to teach.
